Flying
Cards you own that aren’t on the battlefield lose all card types, costs, names, and abilities and become white enchantment Auras named Reprobation that cost 1{W} with enchant creature and “Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a Coward creature with base power and toughness 0/1.” [i](Cards you own put onto the battlefield from other zones while this creature is on the battlefield remain copies of Reprobation, even after this creature leaves the battlefield.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Cosmic Horror, Old Ones

Mechanical Uniqueness — forced card transformation

Add some way to kill your own the Truth?
Or replace luminous bonds with a spell that removes abilities so you can enchant your own creature to remove the effect? (Reprobation)
